## Notification type

Event data for observer notifications

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type Notification = {
    eventType: ContextEventType;
    binding: Readonly<Binding<unknown>>;
    context: Context;
    observers: Set<ContextEventObserver>;
};
```
